about_the_game:
Spirit notes - Xiaoyao Ctrl women's group (with 29999 spirit coins attached) DLC contains the clothes of Xiaoyao Ctrl women's group, with 29999 spirit coins attached to the skin.



*A huge storm has formed, which is bound to sweep the whole world!

*Asymmetric skirt design, sexy and elegant, showing the trend style!

* unlock the skin and learn about the psychological process of "Xiaomei (Xiaoyao)".

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1,Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 / AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB或AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
